page.title: 08A Sigglesthorne school day.
page.content: We come to school on each{week {day.}When we get to school we stand in the{playground}until it is time to come in at{9 am.}but if it is raining we come in as soon as we get to school. Most days we do our{tables.}On a Monday we do{P.E.}and on Tuesday we do Games. We do{Maths}every day. Most days we have{assembly}or{singing. We spend most of the time with {one teacher,}Mr. Robinson but we do work with other teachers for{Music}and {Art.}One afternoon a week Mrs Harrison comes to work on{science}or{art}work. We have{play times}at 10.30, 12.30 and 2.15. The first play and the last play lasts 1/4 of an hour and the dinner time play lasts an hour. We usuallly do{topic work}or {project work}in the afternoon. We go home at{3-30 pm.
